about.title: About me
about.content1: Hi there! My name is Louis and I am a full stack developer graduated in Software Development.
about.content2: Throughout my career, I've worked on a wide range of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications.
about.content3: I'm a reliable, detail-oriented team player who loves tackling new challenges and solving problems with creativity.
about.content4: I thrive on collaboration and building solutions that make a difference. Let's create something extraordinary together!

contact.title: Let's connect!
contact.subtitle: Have any questions or just want to say hello? get in touch with me via social media.
